newsitem.title: USA: Walsh aided by Microsoft partnership.
newsitem.headline: Walsh aided by Microsoft partnership.

text.p: Walsh International Inc said Thursday a partnership with Microsoft Corp has helped the sales success of Premiere, Walsh's strategic sales and marketing management information system for the pharmaceutical industry.
Microsoft Consulting Services helped Walsh build the architecture of its flagship product, and worked closely on many of the technical issues surrounding the development, the company said.
The result, an advanced product, pioneering in its field, and set to be a worldwide market leader in the months ahead.
Walsh said it is a Microsoft Solutions Provider, with a high percentage of Microsoft Certified Professionals.

Premiere's underlying software is a Microsoft Windows- based application which has been developed to IS09001 quality guidelines for management at every level in a pharmaceutical company, covering sales activities, marketing, medical and general management needs, Walsh said.
